comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content:
Ha! It's too easy when you know the name of the boat and the date, Saturday 26 September, 1896. 'Wonga' was a new (hence this photo?) 22 Footer, belonging to a Mr Crane - trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/14068274 Read all about this particular race as if it was yesterday - trove.nla.gov.au/ndp/del/article/14068366 .
" The new 22 -footer 'Wonga' was the next to meet with an accident just below Fort Denison, one of her stays going, which caused her retirement whilst doing well. "

comment.author: 33147718@N05
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/beachcomberaustralia] 22 footer! Aha a little larger than our estimate. Wonderful article!
